sentences.english: Back to back slices technique apply with blonde tone.
sentences.chinese: 使用背靠背片染技术涂放金色系。

sentences.english: Lean against the back and stretch your legs out.
sentences.chinese: 背靠背部和伸展你的腿。

sentences.english: The pole control solution for LB BtB HVDC project has been proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了背靠背换流站极控系统的实施方案。

sentences.english: The grid simulator adopts the four-quadrant converter consists of back-to-back mode.
sentences.chinese: 该装置采用背靠背方式的四象限变流器组成。

sentences.english: Winning on the second night of a back-to-back on the road is always a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，赢下客场背靠背的二场比赛，总是件好事。

sentences.english: Lucy and Lily sit back to back.
sentences.chinese: 露西和莉莉背靠背坐著。

sentences.english: We face away from each other, simply two girls standing back to back.
sentences.chinese: 我们就是两个背靠背站着的女孩，互不照面。

sentences.english: There we sat at night in the tundra, in the snow, back to back.
sentences.chinese: 那时我们夜里在冰原的雪上背靠背的坐着。

sentences.english: Director James Cameron is currently working on two sequels, to be filmed back-to-back.
sentences.chinese: 导演詹姆斯卡梅隆正在准备另两部背靠背拍摄的续集。

sentences.english: A back-to-back HVDC light system of the physical model was established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了一个背靠背轻型直流输电的物理模型。
